title.narrative: Peace talks, recovery, conflict resolution and peace building planning processes and transitional justice processes include provisions on women’s rights, participation and protection.

description.narrative: UN Women provides technical support to strengthen institutions and social capacities to include women's rights, participation and protection in transitional justice and planning processes.
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - disaster prevention and preparedness

title.narrative: SN_Narrative
SN_DRF

Government, state agencies and CSOs have improved their capacities and opportunities for the inclusion of the gender focus and the guarantee of women's rights in peace negotiation, the implementation of peace agreements and the peacebuilding processes.
Number of Disarmament, Demobilization and Reintegration (DDR) strategies with a gender and women's rights approach in its design and implementation, monitoring and follow-up
Mechanisms for political and social dialogue between Government and civil society actors supported by UN Women that contribute to incorporate women's proposals into peacebuilding processes.

Enhanced institutional and social capacities for the inclusion of the gender approach and the guarantee of women's rights, in the implementation of the transitional justice mechanisms
